attributes.action: Re-instate the free bus pass on reaching the age of 60
attributes.additional_details: Scotland , Wales and Northern Ireland all have free bus passes issued to people on reaching 60
attributes.background: On reaching 60 and early retirement .Not wishing to add to road congestion with a car for one person I started to use buses ,but find this expensive  and seem to be in a minority in paying in cash . I think my generation born in the 50's and later are being discriminated against
